topic.title: 期待新政府不只拼经济更要拼公义
姚立明：当政治立场不同 超越蓝绿教会带头做

1_1EQj4bFUidMshx7Byf3Zz3opmHQaD4TMmq.body:
> [nofish](#comment_647_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You need to sign your site after every modification you made. You can do this using the sidebar. (sign both content.json and data/users/content.json)

i've tried the following commands but it's still the same. nobody is able to create a new topic.

python zeronet.py siteSign YOUR_SITE_ADDRESS --inner_path data/users/content.json --publish
python zeronet.py siteSign YOUR_SITE_ADDRESS --publish

for some reason, i just can't use the web frame to publish the site. after i drag the zero icon to the left to display the web frame, my harden tor browser just closes instantly if i scroll down a little. i don't know if it's a bug of the latest version of harden tor browser or zeronet.
